cardContent.folded: Young female college student with allergies, infections, acne, headaches, anxiety, depression, anemia, vitamin D deficiency.
cardContent.expanded: 17-year-old college student with history of allergic rhinitis, anxiety, depression, iron deficiency anemia, and recent vitamin D deficiency. Previously on sertraline, ferrous sulfate, and vitamin D3.

cardContent.folded: Patient reports ongoing fatigue, negative thoughts, some improvement with grounding, struggles with consistency.
cardContent.expanded: Mei Lin's sessions focused on managing depression, anxiety, negative thoughts, and perfectionism through grounding, journaling, and cognitive strategies, with gradual symptom improvement.

cardContent.folded: Persistent fatigue, negative self-beliefs, difficulty maintaining coping strategies, feelings of hopelessness.
cardContent.expanded: Persistent fatigue, negative self-beliefs, difficulty maintaining coping strategies, and ongoing feelings of hopelessness and overwhelm.

cardContent.folded: No medication history with current sessions.
cardContent.expanded: No medication history with current sessions.
